Ammar Adra ammar@digitalinteractive.net

â€¢ Mr. Ammar Adra is a seasoned and recognized gaming industry veteran with more than 15 years of executive experience. Mr. Adra frequently provides private consultation and timely gaming industry insight to interested individuals and investment firms. Mr. Adra has given presentations at leading trade shows and has written articles featured in video game industry publications.

â€¢ Mr. Adra has launched and founded 3 successful companies in the last 18 years: CompuExpert - A leading PC/video game distribution company. GoGamer - A popular online video game retailer. TekNmotion - A manufacture of “Advanced Gaming Gear”. â€¢ In December of 2008, Mr. Adra was appointed president of Digital Interactive. He is responsible for all operations and is fully engaged in the companyâ€™s growth, direction and critical decisions. Mr. Adra earned his B.S. in Management Information Systems from the University of Tulsa. He also attended Cal State Fullerton where he pursued advanced degrees in Management and Finance.
